stable.changelog:
- Use text wrap in settings to prevent title text cut
- Fixed freeze loaf albums when opening app
- Drop raw format support to prevent some issues

beta.changelog:
- Added back built-in video player
- Fixed video streaming loading buffer (Android 14)
- Fixed move, copy file make media corrupt
- Force media cache update after manage, edit files. Prevents images from disappearing from the list when managing inside or out gallery in Android 14
- Remove link to desktop code
- Remove path navigation bar in explore mode
- Internal code cleanings

developer.changelog:
- Set min sdk 23
- Refresh blur background overlay to work in android preference
- Some bug fixes and cleanings

alternative.changelog:
- Use text wrap in settings to prevent title text cut
- Fixed freeze loaf albums when opening app
- Drop raw format support to prevent some issues
